scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:indexer"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:deps && npm run setup:env && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:deps: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../explorer && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.validate: npm run validate:frontend && npm run validate:backend && npm run validate:indexer
scripts.clean: rimraf dist backend/dist explorer/generated && npm run clean:deps
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
